name: Hellas - WIP
description:
Play through Greek mythology on a black-figure vase.

NOTE : UNFINISHED PROTOTYPE

Hellas is a work-in-progress platform/action game about Greek mythology that takes place on the surface of a black-figure vase. Explore ancient myths and fight legendary monsters, or each other, with the help of the gods.

This is a project I've been building on and off for a while (development started in 2011), but being an overly complex solo side-project it has gone very slowly and recently I have not had time to work on it much at all, so it is effectively on hold, aside from occasional tinkering and some work on procedural trees.

There's a devlog on TIGSource which chronicles my progress up to this point, and you can also follow the project on Twitter and YouTube.

Version 25, which you can download below, contains the singleplayer and multiplayer prototype plus some very work-in-progress parts of the larger game.

I still intend to continue with this project, but when and how is the question...
